videos.description: David Efianavi drives and hammers it down over the hand of Ty Outlaw and gets the foul call.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Gardner-Webb’s Efianavi throws down over Outlaw) 2018/11/9 ESHEET

videos.headline: Gardner-Webb's Efianavi throws down over Outlaw

videos.description: Virginia Tech's Justin Robinson collects a steal, drives, flies up and finishes at the rim.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Robinson steals, then finishes at the cup) 2018/11/9 ESHEET

videos.headline: Robinson steals, then finishes at the cup
